name: Note Attack (teamnoteattack)
description:
You are the conductor of an orchestra that keeps making mistakes! You must stop the incorrect notes before your audience hears them.

Controls: 

WASD or arrow keys to move

Point with your cursor, shoot using left click

Music sources (all public domain):

Level 1: https://space.bilibili.com/36491327?spm_id_from=333.337.0.0

Level 2: https://archive.org/details/RuggieroRicci-PaganiniCaprices/24CapriceForSoloVioli...

Level 3: https://opengameart.org/content/holst-the-planets-suite#:~:text=This%20is%20a%20...

Level 4: https://archive.org/details/FlightOfTheBumblebee

Level 5: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xz_4jrhwIiQ
